name: Infested Nunnery
description:
This is my first game jam as well as one other person on our team. I don't have his itch.io screen name so I will update it later but his Discord name is clown#9821. The other contributor is https://galomortal.itch.io/, Galo#5392 who has many game jam projects under their belt and saved this project at the last minute.

Our little nun is fighting off the demon spawn who have invaded her convent. The main title track is not supposed to be a copy of the play track but I will link it if you want to hear it.

https://soundcloud.com/ryanwilbur/gamejamplaytrack

https://soundcloud.com/ryanwilbur/gamejamtitletrack01

All the content in the game was generated during the contest with the exception of a small sound bite of a Gregorian Chant.

Original programmer: clown.

Pixel art and Final programmer: galomortal.

Music and SFX: Ryan Wilbur (alleyesonmeryan)

Credit for the Gregorian chant: Kevin Macleod

Our nun was supposed to grow in size as she killed the hell spawn but we ran out of time to implement it. :(

Hope you enjoy our little project as much as we did!
